text: Q59. | Consider the relational schema R (P, Q, R, S, T, U, V) with the set of FDsF = {P — S, PQ — ST, S 5 RU, RU — S, PT — V}. Which of the following set of FDs is the canonical cover Fc of F? @{fP-S;PQ-T;PQ—-S;S—->R;S—>U;PT—>V;RU—- S} b{P-S;PQ-T;S—->R;S—>U;PT—->V;RU—- S} (c) The given FD set is already a minimum cover.
